name: Jump In!
description:
Hi, my name is Honza and I'm a 18 year young student and this is my first game. It's still in development (for example it doesn't have any UI, sound or saving feature) but I'm actively working on it.

Jump In! is an extremely difficult platformer with a lot of traps that you shouldn't touch, but if you really want to, you can definitely try.

I'm open to any criticism or suggestions.
